io.netty.channel.sctp

Class SctpChannelOption<T>

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<UniqueName>

    public class SctpChannelOption<T>
extends ChannelOption<T>
    Option for configuring the SCTP transport
